TopicTitle: Bugs with the new spacecraft parts

Articles.Content: The wolfhound and cheetah engines' thrust is off-center, and I can't seem to correct this. Also, the 2.5 meter service module's bays aren't symmetrical, and it plays havoc with trying to keep the center of mass lined up with the vector of thrust. Are any fixes planned for these issues?
I can confirm I am having the same issue.
